context: Hi, what movies do you like?
Hi how are you? I like anything action, comedy, click flicks

Yes. Hot Fuzz (2007) is a VERY clever action/comedy.
Nice! I will have to check it out Im always up for a new comedy
resp: The House (2017) was good last year. It's a Will Ferrell comedy.
